meanings.definition: A type of German gingerbread cookie.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, I love to bake lebkuchen with my family.
meanings.sent2: The lebkuchen at the Christmas market smelled delicious.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the lebkuchen for regular cookies and got a spicy surprise!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked lebkuchen.
meanings.sent5: The intricate icing on the lebkuchen made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A traditional Christmas treat in Germany.
meanings.sent1: Every year, we look forward to enjoying lebkuchen on Christmas Eve.
meanings.sent2: The children happily munched on lebkuchen while waiting for Santa.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf tried to swap the presents for lebkuchen, thinking no one would notice!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of lebkuchen filled the house, bringing back memories of childhood Christmases.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown color of the lebkuchen reminded me of the cozy fireplace.

meanings.definition: A sweet and spicy baked good.
meanings.sent1: The lebkuchen had a perfect balance of sweetness and spice.
meanings.sent2: Grandma's secret recipe for lebkuchen always left us wanting more.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a piece of lebkuchen and ran off with a spicy treat!
meanings.sent4: The lebkuchen's flavor exploded in my mouth like a firework of spices.
meanings.sent5: The warm aroma of lebkuchen baking in the oven filled the kitchen with joy.
